abstract.t: This document defines two YANG modules for policy-based network access control, which provide consistent and efficient enforcement of network access control policies based on user-group identity. In addition, this document defines a mechanism to ease the maintenance of the mapping between a user-group ID and a set of IP/MAC addresses to enforce policy-based network access control. Finally, the document defines a RADIUS attribute that is used to communicate the user group identifier as part of identification and authorization information.
